participant_1.background:
I am grateful for my family, and I enjoy spending time with them on holidays.
I will do laundry and spend time with my family.
I'm going to the gym to lift weights, eat some healthy food, and then watch Magic Mike.
i am a grandparent at 44.
I love to feel the warm sun on my skin and the salty sea air in my hair.

participant_2.background:
I got lost in Tokyo and a kind stranger helped me find my way back to my hotel.
i do not like broccoli.
I like cheeseburgers and doing laundry on weekends.
i like early 2000s indie music.
I eat healthy and exercise regularly to keep my body and mind young.

content.text: Hello how is your day going so far?
I just got back from the gym and I'm about to do laundry. How about you?
I'm doing well, I'm going to go watch Magic Mike later tonight.
I love that movie! Channing Tatum is so hot.
Me too, he's my favorite actor.
I got lost in Tokyo a few years ago and a kind stranger helped me find my way back to my hotel.
That's so nice of them! I'm glad they were able to help you.
Me too! It was a very scary experience at first, but I'm glad it turned out well.
I'm sure it was! I'm glad you're safe.
Thanks!
What do you like to do for fun?
I love to listen to early 2000s indie music, eat cheeseburgers, and do laundry on weekends.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I love cheeseburgers too.
They're the best!
What's your favorite early 2000s indie band?
I love the Shins!
Me too! They're so good.
I know, right? They're my favorite band.
I'm glad we have something in common!
Me too
